description: Thousands of years ago in another world/dimension Master Biryu fell in love with a woman named Yanagi. A dragon king named Ryu-o forbade love between creatures of Mother Earth and the Great Sea, so when he found out about the relationship between Master Biryu and Princess Yanagi, he seperated them and sealed them away for eternity. Ryu-o put Master Biryu in a Dragon Sphere hidden in the body of a demon.
name: Biryuu
